unnormalised: Barabor, lokanno, aamhi jevnache vishayan vishay karuya. Va, adheik spashhtpane, mi kashhi randpacho *pryatna* karta tacher vichar karuya. Hum tya prakarchi vyakti ashi, je "chimut bhar mitth" mhantlear shakeracho ardho bhag rikam karta. Mhazi randpachi mapanne... cholte dhara tya vigyanacher adharit astat tatun "vibes-based" astat. Mhaja gharche dukhi.
normalised: Okay, lokanno, atam jevnachi gozal koruya. Vo, odik barobarayen, hanv kashi jevn korpak *proyatn* karta tacher uloiya. Hanv ashi monis zanvun asa zaka "chimut bhar meeth" mhanlear shakerachin nimhi rikami kortam mhunn dista. Mhajim jevnache mapan ... aami fakt mhannuya ti vignanacher adharit aschea poros "vibes-based" odik asat. Mhajem dukhest kutumb.

unnormalised: He saglyanin nirdoshpane suru zale. Mi daal makhani randche tharavle, karan, tumak mahit asa, te kitlem kathin asunk shakhta? Prasiddha antim utram. Mi resipi ugadi, ani mhaka pahile disle te mhanje "1 cup urad dal." Ek CUP? Hi kashhi nischit nirarthak gosht asa? Mazyaj aajechya divasanim, tanne fattfaksh yatle asunk zatle. Tari pan, mi maza measuring cup kaddle, jao ki hum khoob vaigyanik aasi. Dislem ki, "1 cup" hum vicharleapeksha khoob zasti daal aasi. Maza bhandi aata daal volkenosarkhe disunk lagle, ki phunkan vadyache tayari asa.
normalised: Hi sogli gozal nirdoshpanan suru zali. Hanvem dal makhani korpak nirnnay ghetlo, kiteak mhannlear, tumkam zannam asa, tem kitlench kathinn asunk xakta? Famas zallelea xevottache utram. Hanvem recipe ugddi, ani poilim hanvem pollelem tem "eka cup urad dal" aslem. Ek CUP? Hem kitlem barik manddlolem nirarthakpan asa? Mhajje aaji-aajichea disanim, tanim kiteak fokot dolleanim mapunk favo aslem. Tori astana, hanvem majem measuring cup kaddlem, khup scientific dista astana. Dista tem, "ek cup" hanvem chintlelea poros khup chodd dal asa. Mhajem tollem atam dalachea jvalamukhi sarkhem asa je futtpak toyar asa.

unnormalised: Pudhe, "1/2 tsp lal mirchi powder." Aata, mhaka thoddi tikhat aavadta, pan ardhi chamcha? Tem ek prakarache homeopathic aasata! Mi tyala udhartaai dilli, oh, kadchit 2 tsp? Tyamule tayar zalela pakwan rang kadhu shakata. Mazya bhartyar, tanne aashirvad dilya, adukhal ani pani dharle.
normalised: Uprant, "eka cupache don bhag kel'le tea poros thoddoso tambddi mirsangechi pitthi." Atam, maka thoddi tikka avddotta, punn ardh tea chamcho? Tem praktical ghara ghorche upcharache bhaxen asta! Hanvem te udarponan vaddoilem, oh, sadharan don tea chamche poros? Mellil'lem jevn rang khoddpak puro asa. Mhajje ghorkarn, tache punnachem ashirvad aso, vinayn tean khoklo ani tannem udok ghetlem.

unnormalised: Ani magir aale looni. Resipint “2 tbsp looni” mangitale. Don chamche?! He DAAL MAKHANI aasa, lokanno! Tem loonyan tarunk lagta! Mi lagbhag 100 g looni takle. Barobar, kadchit thode zasti. Cholte dhara ki daal navin polish keleli auto-rickshasarakhi chamakat aasa.
normalised: Uprant butter aaili. Recipe "don table chamche butter" mhunta. Don table chamche?! Hem D-A-L M-A-K-H-A-N-I asa, lokanno! Tem butteran buddun vochpak zai! Hanvem sumar ekxim gram butter ghatlem. Okay, kiteak thoddoso odik nhoye. Fakt mhannuya tea dallean eke novea zalkal'lea auto-rickshaw sarkhi zalkali.

unnormalised: Resipint "2 tas ukhadan" pan sangitale. Don TAAS?! Mazi laksha denyachi vel mazya lahan mulapeksha lamb aasi. Lagbhag 45 minutan nantar, mi tyala "purse zalela" ghoshan dilli. Tem nasle. Daal thodi khardal zupyasarakhi hoti.
normalised: Recipe "don horanchea vorak mandd korunk" mhunnui sangta. Don HOR? Mhajem dhyanachem samarthy mhajje lhan bhurgea poros thoddo asa. Sumar challis ani panch minuttam uprant, hanvem tem "pura zait" mhunn jahir kelem. Tem naslem. Tea dalleak thodde renv sarkhi zat asli.

unnormalised: Ani "taaza malai" chya vishayan suruvaat karu naka. Resipint "1/4 cup taaza malai" mangitali. Gambhirtane? Koni tri 1/4 cup measuring device dharata? Mi fakt cartonantun sargam takle. Mhaka disata tem 1/2 cup sarkhe hote. Kadchit.
normalised: Ani "taje kreme" vixim ulovnk dhi naka. Recipe "eka cupache chovthai bhag kel'le tea poros thoddi tajem cream" mhunta. Gambhirponan? Kunnak quarter cup mapachem sadhan asa? Hanvem fakt thoddishi karttunantle udka sarkhi ghatli. Maka dista tem eka cupache don bhag kel'le tea poros thoddi asli. Kiteak punn.

unnormalised: Antim utpadan disle... barobar, te daal makhani sarkhe disle. Thodasa. Tikhatichi patli steel pighalu shakli asti, tem loonyan tarat hote, ani tyachi vishay lava sarkhi hoti, pan are, tem khanar hote! (Thodasa.)
normalised: Nimmnem utpadon dista... barobar, tem dal makhani sarkhem distalem. Kaxem tori. Tikkacho darjo polead galounk puro asta, tea dallean butter buddun voitalem, ani tachi zat lava sarkhi asli, punn hey, tem jevnchapak melltalem! (Kaxem tori.)

unnormalised: Maza bhartyar, nehami diplomat, tyala "chintan" ghoshan dilli. Dusrikade, mazya muline fakt bot dakhavale ani mhantali, "Tikhat!" (Ti don varshanchi aasi. Ti pramanik aasi.)
normalised: Mhajje ghorkarn, sarke rajdut zanvun, tem "dekhniyek" mhunn jahir kelem. Mhajje dheu, dusri vatten, fakt nirdex kelo ani mhunno, "Tikha!" (Ti don vorsanchi asa. Ti imanadari asa.)

unnormalised: Tar, yatil moral? Kadchit restoranantun daal makhani order karane thik rahil. Va, mahit asa, resipila fakt anusaar karava. Pan tyat maja kuthe asa? Mi vichar karta mi pudhil veli saglya vatsuancha mapan mazya sobat karin: "yacha ek mutth," "tyacha ek chinta," ani "premachi mothi sankhya (ani looni)!" Tevasech, mi fire extinguisher kharedi karayala pahije, fakt kashasati asalyaas.
normalised: Mhannttlear, hea gozalicho nithi? Kiteak dal makhani eke resterauntantlean order korun soddun dhi. Vo, tumkam zannam asa, recipe barobar follou korun soddun dhi. Punn tanntun kitlem moj asa? Hanv chintam mhannttlear hanv soglle vostuk majje aapnna upkaran map korunk toyar asa: "Ek muthi bhar hem," "ek chintvallo bhar tem," ani "khup mog (ani butter)!" Ani, hanvem ek agvisovnni dukanantlean gheunk favo, kasak mhunn.

unnormalised: Gambhirtane, mazhe Bharateey purvaj majhya randnyachya kamtartevar nirash hotil. Kadchit mi thode varga ghyavaila pahije. Mi mazya resipila majbut 2/5 tare dain-nishchit shiknyacha vakra prastut aasa!
normalised: Gambhirponan, mhajje Bharoti purvoz majje jevnachem samarthy naslelea vorak niraax zatale. Khas korun hanvem classes gheunk favo. Hanv majje recipeak don cupanche panch bhag kel'le tea poros sarke strong star ditam - nitinchean xikpachem tor asa!
